name: DOGO
description: DOGO is a local-multiplayer, competitive platformer in which players compete in an ancient ritual to convert opposing cultures to their own alignment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 100 MB available space
